subject: Applicability of discount/ premium on COS Proposals pertaining to Utility Shifting - reg.
text: HRay <7 @THRf sfetarrut (Tsw 4Rdev 3r RTTHTf HRT FGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Trn4a T 0fl-5 Qa 6, #az7-10, ERAT, 78f @ocff 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 THI/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/ 2023 Circular No.11.50/ 2023 dated 04th July, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAi/PPP/1/2022 (Comp. No. 178141)} Sub: Applicability of discount/ premium on COS Proposals pertaining to Utility Shifting reg: Reference minutes of 565th meeting of Executive Committee (EC), Agenda item No. 565.06, up before EC by Kerala Division regarding execution of deposit works by Concessionaire on COS for Jal Jeevan Mission Pipelines in following HAM Projects in Kerala: 1 6 Laning of Kappirkkad 6 laning of Kappirikkad Thalikulam Section of NH-66 (Ch. 335.8 to Ch. 369.0) ji. 6 of Thalikulam to Kodungallur section of NH-66 (Ch: 369 to Ch: 397.7) 2 Accordingly, the matter was discussed in EC and it has been decided that in all COS proposals pertaining to utility shifting, the tender discount/ premium will be applicable, as is for civil works, as the utility shifting forms the part of the Contract price. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 2.3 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation_ HA4, 'A1 { 7 9 NHAL Policy put laning being applied yo? Copy
